alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 8:16PM EDT until May 21 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cattaraugus County in western New York... Southwestern Erie County in western New York... Chautauqua County in western New York... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 814 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms is moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Allegany State Park, Evans, Westfield, Lakewood, Gowanda, Silver Creek and Falconer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 57A. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
